_header: My heartly love is in your governance
_description: A roundel by Charles d’Orléans — 7 lines (abbaaba), incomplete (probably 14-line type)

BLRoy16Fii.First Lines:
MY hertly loue is in your gouernaunceAnd euer shall whill þat
                    I lyye may…
BLRoy16Fii.Last Lines:
…Þe shal not fynd feynyng or variaunsAS in my part that
                    wyl I trewly lay
